presentation-1: I’m Lucas, a passionate and ambitious software developer currently pursuing an engineering degree at Polytech Annecy, specialized in IDU (Computer Science, Data & Usage).
presentation-2: With hands-on experience in web development through internships and work-study programs, I have developed strong skills in Full Stack development, working with modern technologies such as JavaScript, TypeScript, Vue.js, and C#. I enjoy building clean, efficient, and user-friendly applications, and I’m always eager to learn new tools and frameworks to stay at the forefront of technology.
presentation-3: My goal is to contribute to impactful projects while continuously improving my expertise as a software developer.
web-development-text: I build responsive and interactive websites using modern technologies like Vue.js, JavaScript, and Tailwind CSS, creating clean and user-friendly interfaces.
application-development-text: I develop desktop and web applications with a focus on efficiency and scalability, using languages like C#, TypeScript, and Python to solve real-world problems.
card-games-text: I’m a big fan of card games like Yu-Gi-Oh, Gwynt, Pokémon, and traditional card games. I enjoy the strategy, mechanics, and fun of playing and collecting cards.
animation-text: I explore animation and storytelling inspired by manga and anime, creating illustrations, sequences, and visual narratives that combine creativity with technical skill.
shool-1-text: Specialization in IDU (Computer Science, Data & Usage)
shool-4-name: STI2D High School Diploma, Saint Michel Annecy
work-1-text: Temporary position as a day sorter
work-2-text: Work-study as Full Stack Web Developer for the redesign of the company's subscription system
